name: 04-Data-Preparation-and-Feature-Engineering
parameters: --var selectOperation1=creditScoreComputation --var agescore1=2 --var agefrom1=25 --var ageto1=35 --var agescore2=3 --var agefrom2=36 --var ageto2=45 --var agescore3=4 --var agefrom3=46 --var ageto3=70 --var ageweightage=1 --var prevStage=false --var goToNextTab2=false --var genderscore1=1 --var genderscore2=1 --var genderweightage=1 --var goToPreviousTab2=false --var goToNextTab3=false --var jobscore1=0 --var jobscore2=1 --var jobscore3=2 --var jobscore4=3 --var jobweightage=3 --var goToPreviousTab3=false --var goToNextTab=false --var housingscore1=0 --var housingscore2=1 --var housingscore3=2 --var housingweightage=2 --var savingaccscore1=1 --var savingaccscore2=2 --var savingaccscore3=3 --var savingaccscore4=4 --var savingaccweightage=3 --var checkingaccscore1=1 --var checkingaccscore2=2 --var checkingaccscore3=3 --var checkingaccscore4=4 --var checkingaccweightage=3 --var creditamtscore1=1 --var creditamtfrom1=0 --var creditamtto1=250 --var creditamtscore2=3 --var creditamtfrom2=251 --var creditamtto2=1500 --var creditamtscore3=4 --var creditamtfrom3=1501 --var creditamtto3=2500 --var creditamtscore4=5 --var creditamtfrom4=2501 --var creditamtto4=4000 --var creditamtscore5=7 --var creditamtfrom5=4001 --var creditamtto5=20000 --var creditamtweightage=3 --var durationscore1=1 --var durationfrom1=0 --var durationto1=4 --var durationscore2=2 --var durationfrom2=5 --var durationto2=12 --var durationscore3=3 --var durationfrom3=13 --var durationto3=18 --var durationscore4=4 --var durationfrom4=19 --var durationto4=24 --var durationscore5=5 --var durationfrom5=25 --var durationto5=75 --var durationweightage=2 --var thresholdvalue=30 --var goToPreviousTab4=false --var applicantID=1,2,3

nodes.name: Read CSV
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it.
nodes.hint: Infer the schema when a new file is selected or the file content has changed

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: header
fields.title: Header
fields.description: Whether the file has a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Whether to drop the Special Characters and Spaces in Column Name.

fields.name: mode
fields.title: Mode
fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.name: addInputFileName
fields.title: Whether to Add Input File Name as Column in the Dataframe

fields.name: encoding
fields.title: Encoding
fields.description: Decodes the CSV files by the given encoding type

fields.name: quote
fields.title: Quote
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quoted values where the separator can be part of the value

fields.name: escape
fields.title: Escape
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quotes inside an already quoted value.

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: extraOptionsKeys
fields.title: Properties Name
fields.description: Extra options/properites available while executing in Read CSV.

fields.name: extraOptionsValues
fields.title: Properties Value
fields.description: Config Values for the Corresponding properites name

fields.name: comment

nodes.name: Math Expression
nodes.description: Creates new columns using the specified expressions

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level

nodes.name: Expressions
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by adding new columns to the incoming Dataframe as per the Expression computation

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: expressions
fields.value: ["IF(Age < 25, 0, IF((Age >= 25 AND Age <= 35), 2,IF((Age >= 36 AND Age <= 45), 3,IF((Age >= 46 AND Age <= 70), 4, 0))))*1","IF(UPPER(TRIM(Sex)) == 'MALE',1,IF(UPPER(TRIM(Sex)) == 'FEMALE', 1, 0)) * 1","IF((LOWER(TRIM(Job)) == 'unskilled and non-resident'), 0,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Job)) == 'unskilled and resident'),1,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Job))=='skilled'), 2,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Job)) == 'highly skilled'), 3, 0)))) * 3","IF((LOWER(TRIM(Housing)) == 'free'), 0,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Housing)) == 'rent'), 1,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Housing)) == 'own'), 2, 0))) * 2","IF((LOWER(TRIM(Saving_Accounts)) == 'little'), 1,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Saving_Accounts)) == 'moderate'), 2,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Saving_Accounts)) == 'quite rich'), 3, IF((LOWER(TRIM(Saving_Accounts)) == 'rich'), 4, 0)))) * 3","IF((LOWER(TRIM(Checking_Account)) == 'little'), 1, IF((LOWER(TRIM(Checking_Account)) == 'moderate'), 2,IF((LOWER(TRIM(Checking_Account)) == 'quite rich'), 3, IF((LOWER(TRIM(Checking_Account)) == 'rich'), 4, 0)))) * 3","IF((Credit_Amount >= 0 AND Credit_Amount <= 250), 1, IF((Credit_Amount >= 251 AND Credit_Amount <= 1500), 3, IF((Credit_Amount >= 1501 AND Credit_Amount <= 2500), 4,  IF((Credit_Amount >= 2501 AND Credit_Amount <= 4000), 5,IF((Credit_Amount >= 4001 AND Credit_Amount <= 20000), 7, 0))))) * 3","IF((Duration >= 0 AND Duration <= 4), 1,IF((Duration >= 5 AND Duration <= 12), 2,IF((Duration >= 13 AND Duration <= 18), 3, IF((Duration >= 19 AND Duration <= 24), 4,IF((Duration >= 25 AND Duration <= 75), 5, 0))))) * 2"]
fields.title: Expression
